item.title: I hate getting Pap smears. Is there a safe alternative?
item.description: You may have heard about HPV testing and self-swabbing to collect the sample. Does that work as well? Here are the ins and outs of this newer option.

item.title: Botulism outbreak sickens more than 50 babies and expands to all ByHeart products
item.description: At least 51 babies in 19 states have been treated for botulism after being exposed to organic ByHeart baby formula. The New-York based manufacturer is...

item.title: What to know about death cap mushrooms, blamed for poisonings in California
item.description: Death cap mushrooms look harmless, but are responsible for the majority of the world's mushroom-related deaths. California officials say 21 people hav...

item.title: The fight to beat neglected tropical diseases was going well. 2025 could change that
item.description: The campaign to prevent and treat these diseases has seen great success thanks to a USAID program. Now that program is gone.

item.title: Scientists use AI to help make bionic hands work better for people who need them
item.description: Scientists are using artificial intelligence to make bionic limbs act more like natural ones.
